org.richfaces.fragment.dataScroller

Interface DataScroller

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RichFacesDataScroller

    public interface DataScroller
    Author:
    Jiri Stefek

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  DataScroller.DataScrollerSwitchButton
      Represents the buttons by which the dataScroller can be controlled.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getActivePageNumber()
      Gets the index of the currently selected page.
      boolean hasPages()
      Determines whether there are some pages to scroll over with this DataScroller.
      void switchTo(DataScroller.DataScrollerSwitchButton btn)
      Switch by buttons.
      void switchTo(int pageNumber)
      Direct switch to page.

    • Method Detail

      • getActivePageNumber

        int getActivePageNumber()
        Gets the index of the currently selected page. Indexed from 1.
        Returns:
        the position of the page at which the dataScroller currently is

      • switchTo

        void switchTo(int pageNumber)
        Direct switch to page. Indexed from 1. Page must exist. Without any waiting.
        Parameters:
        pageNumber - of the page which will be selected

      • switchTo

        void switchTo(DataScroller.DataScrollerSwitchButton btn)
        Switch by buttons. Clicks on the chosen button. Without any waiting.
        Parameters:
        btn - the button which will be used to control the dataScroller in order to switch to a wished page
        See Also:
        DataScroller.DataScrollerSwitchButton

      • hasPages

        boolean hasPages()
        Determines whether there are some pages to scroll over with this DataScroller.
        Returns:
        true if there is more than one page of data, false otherwise
